item.title: Geekswithblogs.net
item.description: Joe Mayo, November 26, 2013. In previous versions of LINQ to Twitter, I used XUnit, which has a nice Assert.Throws method that I used a lot. When I started the PCL version of LINQ to Twitter, I started using MSTest and missed Assert.Throws .
